METABOLITE: Chemical compounds and metabolic products including primary and secondary metabolites
GENE: Gene names and genetic elements including protein-coding genes and regulatory sequences
ORGANISM: Scientific names of organisms including species, genus, and common names
PLANT_PART: Plant anatomical structures and organs such as leaves, roots, stems, and flowers
ENZYME: Enzyme names and classifications including EC numbers and protein identifiers
COMPOUND: Chemical compounds including drugs, natural products, and synthetic molecules
PATHWAY: Biological pathways and metabolic processes including biochemical reactions
ANALYTICAL_METHOD: Laboratory techniques and analytical methods used in research
